tool_description: API for commission-free US stock trading
name: Alpaca Trading
title: Alpaca Trading

api_list.name: Get assets
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://alpacahq-alpaca-trading-v1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/assets"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "alpacahq-alpaca-trading-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get the account
api_list.description: Returns the account associated with the API key

api_list.name: Get a list of orders
api_list.description: Retrieves a list of orders for the account, filtered by the supplied query parameters.

optional_parameters.name: status
optional_parameters.description: Order status to be queried. By default, open is used.

optional_parameters.name: until
optional_parameters.description: limits the result with order time up to this value. the result is unlimited if ommitted

api_list.name: Get an order by client order id
Get an order
api_list.description: etrieves a single of order for the given order_id.

api_list.name: Get open positions
api_list.description: Retrieves a list of the account's open positions.

url = "https://alpacahq-alpaca-trading-v1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/positions"

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "alpacahq-alpaca-trading-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
